title: Study Hall: How to Make Money from a Podcast
itunes:title: Study Hall: How to Make Money from a Podcast
description:
In this study hall, podcast superstar Mandii B discusses three revenue streams that podcasters can use to monetize their shows. She opened up about her experience with patreon, live touring and ads.

Link to Full Interview: https://youtu.be/N9mYIYcegvs


EYL University: https://www.eyluniversity.com

EYL University 65% Off Sale

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
